name: coolMode_turnOn
description: This function is used to activate the cooling mode of an air conditioner.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to activate the cooling mode.

parameters.name: coolingTemperature
parameters.description: The temperature to set for the cooling mode.

parameters.name: predefinedCoolingTemperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the temperature for the cooling mode (e.g., Celsius, Fahrenheit).
